QueryToFindElements.Main:
SELECT o1.ea_guid AS ItemGuid FROM ((((((t_object as o1 INNER JOIN t_Package p ON p.Package_ID = o1.Package_ID) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p1 ON Package_p1.Package_id = p.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p2 ON Package_p2.Package_id = Package_p1.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p3 ON Package_p3.Package_id = Package_p2.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p4 ON Package_p4.Package_id = Package_p3.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p5 ON Package_p5.Package_id = Package_p4.parent_id) Inner join t_objectProperties p1 on p1.object_ID = o1.Object_ID
where o1.stereotype = 'TMF_Application'
AND p1.Property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND p1.Value = '3'

Filters.Change: AND o.ea_guid in ( SELECT oChange.ea_guid FROM t_object oChange INNER JOIN t_objectproperties opChange ON oChange.Object_ID = opChange.Object_ID WHERE opChange.Property = 'CR' AND opChange.Value = '#SearchTerm#' )
Filters.Release: AND o.ea_guid in ( SELECT o2.ea_guid FROM (t_object o2 INNER JOIN t_objectproperties op2 ON o2.Object_ID = op2.Object_ID) WHERE op2.Property = 'CR' AND op2.Value in ( SELECT oChange.ea_guid FROM ((t_object oRelease INNER JOIN t_connector con ON oRelease.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_object oChange ON con.Start_Object_ID = oChange.Object_ID) WHERE oRelease.ea_guid = '#SearchTerm#' ) )

QueryToCheckFoundElements.Main:
SELECT o.Name AS ItemName , 'object' as ItemType , o.ea_guid AS ItemGuid , o.Object_Type AS ElementType , o.StereoType AS ElementStereotype , p.name AS PackageName , package_p1.name AS PackageParentLevel1 , package_p2.name AS PackageParentLevel2 , package_p3.name AS PackageParentLevel3 , package_p4.name AS PackageParentLevel4 , package_p5.name AS PackageParentLevel5 FROM ((((((t_object o INNER JOIN t_package p ON p.Package_ID = o.Package_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p1 ON package_p1.package_id = p.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p2 ON package_p2.package_id = package_p1.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p3 ON package_p3.package_id = package_p2.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p4 on package_p4.package_id = package_p3.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p5 on package_p5.package_id = package_p4.parent_id) WHERE o.ea_guid in (#ElementGuids#) AND o.ea_guid in ( Select o1.ea_guid from ((((t_object as o1 Inner Join t_connector c on o1.Object_ID = c.Start_Object_ID) Inner JOin t_object o2 on c.end_Object_ID = o2.Object_ID)
Inner Join t_objectProperties p on p.Object_ID = o1.Object_ID) Inner Join t_objectProperties p2 on p2.Object_ID = o2.Object_ID) Where o1.Stereotype = 'TMF_Application' AND o1.ParentID = o2.Object_ID AND p.Property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND p.Value = '3' AND p2.Property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND p2.Value NOT LIKE '2' )

Check.Rationale: Child Application level must be smaller than parent Application
